description:
In this course I will teach the basics to get started brewing in 30 minutes. Not only will this course save you time it willsave you money as well. I will give an overview of craft beer, and where’s the best to find the best information to make beer for free. I give you all the places to buy your ingredients and equipment. The cheapest way to get started making your first batch of beer

Topics discuss:

Basic Beer information

BJCP(The purpose of the Beer Judge Certification Program is “to promote beer literacy and the appreciation of real beer, and to recognize beer tasting and evaluation skills.0 and GABF(Great American Beer Festival is a three-day annual event hosted by the Brewers Association, held in Denver, Colorado,)

Where to learn the best brewing techniques for free

Where I buy my brewing equipment for really cheap.

Beer measurements

Please provide me with feedback and a rating.
title: Learn How to Brew in 30 minuntes
